feature.label: FCI - Federation Computing Interface
feature.provider-name: University of Patras - ECE / NAM group
feature.description: Federation Computing Interface (FCI) is an API for accessing resources of the federation. It is an SDK for developing applications that access requested resources through the office services during operation of testing. It is quite easy to embed it into your application/ SUT in order to gain control of the requested resources during testing.
